title: Ottsuls Shepherd-Hooks Adjustable for Bird-Feeder Lantern Plant-Hook Garden-Stake - Plant Stand Hanger for Outdoor Flower Basket, Bird Feeder Hanger Weddings Decor
descriptions:
Ottsuls Shepherd Hooks – Adjustable Garden Stake for Bird Feeders, Lanterns, and Plants

Bring vintage charm and dependable strength to your garden, patio, or event with Ottsuls Shepherd Hooks. Built from heavy-grade steel with a smooth black powder-coated finish, these hooks deliver rust-free durability and a stylish look that complements any outdoor setting.

Key features:
- Rock-solid stability: Upgraded 5-prong base with extra-long, double-forked stakes grips the ground firmly to resist tipping and wobble, even in breezy conditions.
- Versatile use: Ideal for outdoor wedding aisles and everyday décor. Hang flower pots, plant baskets, solar lights, lanterns, flower jars, candle holders, garden lights, mason jars, string lights, wind chimes, ornaments, flower balls, birdbaths, shooting targets, coconut coco-fiber moss baskets, hummingbird feeders, and more.
- Premium design: Vintage and stylish profile crafted from heavy-grade steel with a smooth black powder coating for long-lasting, rust-resistant performance.
- Adjustable and convenient: 2-part pole system lets you adjust height to fit your display. Screws together quickly, stays firm, and disassembles easily for compact storage.
- Easy setup: Includes four ground stakes for quick, secure installation—no special tools required.

What’s included:
- Adjustable shepherd hook pole (2-part system)
- 4 ground stakes (upgraded 5-prong base assembly)
- Hardware for fast, secure assembly

Why choose Ottsuls:
Ottsuls Store is committed to high-quality products and an excellent shopping experience. If you encounter any issues with your shepherd hook, our customer support team will provide a prompt solution.

Elevate your outdoor décor, streamline event setup, and enjoy reliable, elegant hanging displays with Ottsuls Shepherd Hooks.
